mapper.insert: insert into simgotidb.client (clntNm, clntBirth, clntGen, clntJumin, clntPhone, clntEmail) values (#{clntNm}, #{clntBirth}, #{clntGen}, #{clntJumin}, #{clntPhone}, #{clntEmail})
mapper.select: select clntPk from simgotidb.client where clntNm = #{clntNm} and clntJumin = #{clntJumin} and useYN = 'Y'
mapper.update: update simgotidb.client set clntPhone = #{clntPhone}, clntEmail = #{clntEmail}, clntUdt = now() where clntPk = #{clntPk} and useYN = 'Y';

and d.covDCode not in (1012010101, 1012010103, 1012010201, 1012010203, 1012010301, 1012010303)
select covNm from simgotidb.coverage where covCode = #{covCode}
mapper.insert: insert into simgotidb.payment (premium, payDueDt, accBank, accNum, accNm) values (#{premium}, #{payDueDt}, #{accBank}, #{accNum}, #{accNm});

insert into simgotidb.application (payPk, polNo, comCode, insComCode, clntPk, trPurpose, trPlace, trFromDt, trToDt, covCode, clntCnt, premium) values (#{payPk}, #{polNo}, #{comCode}, #{insComCode}, #{clntPk}, #{trPurpose}, #{trPlace}, #{trFromDt}, #{trToDt}, #{covCode}, #{clntCnt}, #{premium});
insert into simgotidb.applicationInsuredList (aplPk, clntPk, premium, repYN, adult) values (#{aplPk}, #{clntPk}, #{prem}, #{repYN}, #{adult});
mapper.select: select clntPk from simgotidb.client where clntBirth = #{clntJuminA} and clntPhone = #{clntPhone} and useYN = 'Y';
select clntPk from simgotidb.client where clntNm = #{clntNm} and clntBirth = #{clntJuminA} and clntPhone = #{clntPhone} and useYN = 'Y';

select a.aplPk, a.trFromDt, a.trToDt, a.trPlace, cd.codeNm as aplState from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.code cd on a.aplStateCode = cd.codePk where a.clntPk = #{clntPk} and a.useYN = 'Y' and cd.useYN = 'Y' order by a.aplPk desc;

select a.aplPk, a.trFromDt, a.trToDt, a.trPlace, cd.codeNm as aplState, a.aplStateCode, a.clntCnt, a.premium, c.covNm from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.coverage c on a.covCode = c.covCode join simgotidb.code cd on a.aplStateCode = cd.codePk where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} and a.useYN ='Y' and c.useYN = 'Y';

select c.clntNm, c.clntBirth, c.clntGen, l.premium, l.repYN, l.adult from simgotidb.applicationInsuredList l join simgotidb.client c on l.clntPk = c.clntPk where l.aplPk = #{aplPk} and l.useYN = 'Y' and c.useYN = 'Y' order by l.repYn desc;
select p.premium, p.accBank, p.accNm, p.accNum, p.payDueDt from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.payment p on a.payPk = p.payPk where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} and a.useYN = 'Y' and p.useYN = 'Y'

select c.clntNm, c.clntBirth, c.clntGen, c.clntPhone, c.clntEmail from simgotidb.applicationInsuredList l join simgotidb.client c on l.clntPk = c.clntPk where l.aplPk = #{aplPk} and l.repYN = 'Y' and l.useYN = 'Y' and c.useYN = 'Y';
mapper.update: update simgotidb.client set clntEmail = #{clntEmail}, clntUdt = now() where clntPk = #{clntPk} and useYN = 'Y';
mapper.select: select a.aplPk, a.trFromDt, a.trToDt, a.trPlace, a.clntCnt, a.premium, c.covNm, cl.clntNm, a.polNo, cl.clntEmail, cd.codeNm as trPurpose, p.payedDt, cl.clntPhone from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.coverage c on a.covCode = c.covCode join simgotidb.client cl on a.clntPk = cl.clntPk join simgotidb.code cd on a.trPurpose = cd.codePk join simgotidb.payment p on a.payPk = p.payPk where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} and a.useYN ='Y' and c.useYN = 'Y';
select c.clntNm, c.clntBirth, c.clntGen from simgotidb.applicationInsuredList al join simgotidb.client c on al.clntPk = c.clntPk where al.aplPk = #{aplPk} order by al.repYn desc;
select d.covDCode, d.covDNm, d.covDAmt from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.coverageDetail d on a.covCode = d.covCode where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} order by d.covDCode asc
select p.payedYN from simgotidb.application a inner join simgotidb.payment p on a.payPk = p.payPk where a.aplPk = #{aplPk}
call aplRefund(#{aplPk},#{clntPk},#{refnBank},#{refnAccount},#{refnName})
